node.name: ATM Cave
node.summary: Experience the cave of the stone sepulcher (ATM Cave), a subterranean cathedral in the heart of Cayo that features rare artifacts and mineralized human remains that date back hundreds of years. ‍
node.body:
(AIR/LAND)

Experience the cave of the stone sepulcher, a subterranean cathedral in the heart of Cayo that features rare artifacts and mineralized human remains that date back hundreds of years. Trip includes round-trip airfare on Tropic Air, fully guided tour by expert tour operator PACZ, land transfer to and from the cave, entrance fees, and lunch. Swimming required.

(BOAT/LAND)

Travel by boat then land. Same basic details once you get there.

‍
node.heroattribution: By Jkolecki [CC BY-SA 3.0 (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0) or GFDL (http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/fdl.html)], from Wikimedia Commons
node.metadescription: Explore the ancient ATM Cave in Belize with El Pescador. Discover rare artifacts and mineralized human remains in this stunning subterranean cathedral. Book you

node.name: Catamaran Snorkeling Trip to Caye Caulker
node.summary: Sail to our neighboring island of Caye Caulker, located 10 miles south of Ambergris Caye. Enjoy this quaint village. Snorkel the famous Hol Chan Marine Reserve, swim with nurse sharks and stingrays at Shark Ray Alley.
node.body:
Sail to our neighboring island of Caye Caulker, located 10 miles south of Ambergris Caye. Enjoy this quaint village. Snorkel the famous Hol Chan Marine Reserve, swim with nurse sharks and stingrays at Shark Ray Alley. Full day trip includes sodas, rum punch, and two snorkeling stops. It does not include lunch or park fees.

‍
node.metadescription: Sail to Caye Caulker from Ambergris Caye, snorkel at Hol Chan Marine Reserve, and swim with sharks and rays at Shark Ray Alley. Full day trip with two stops!

node.name: Catamaran Sunset Sailing
node.summary: Enjoy sailing on a catamaran to watch the sunset over the clear Caribbean waters.
node.body:
Wind down for your day while you enjoy sailing on Catamaran to watch the sunset over the clear Caribbean waters.

Depart from El Pescador at 3:30 pm – return approximately 7:30 pm.
node.metadescription: Relax and sail on a catamaran to watch the sunset over the Caribbean waters. Depart from El Pescador at 3:30 pm and return by 7:30 pm. Book your sunset cruise!

node.name: Cave Tubing and Zipline Or Belize Zoo Or Xunantunich
node.summary: Travel by boat to the mainland where you will choose either zip lining through the rainforest, a visit to the Belize Zoo or exploring the Maya ruin of Xunantunich in the morning. After lunch, enjoy a refreshing tubing adventure down a river and through ancient Maya Caves. Return to the island via boat. Full day tour includes lunch.
node.body:
Travel by boat to the mainland where you will choose either zip lining through the rainforest, a visit to the Belize Zoo or exploring the Maya ruin of Xunantunich in the morning. After lunch, enjoy a refreshing tubing adventure down a river and through ancient Maya Caves. Return to the island via boat. Full day tour includes lunch.

Cave Tubing and Zipline (boat/land) US $220 per person

Cave Tubing and Belize Zoo (boat/land) US $170 per person

Cave Tubing and Xunantunich (boat/land) US $220 per person
node.metadescription: Experience adventure in Belize with El Pescador. Choose zip lining, the Belize Zoo, or exploring Xunantunich, plus cave tubing. Full-day tour with lunch include

node.name: Flats Fishing
node.summary: El Pescador, means “The fisherman” and we specialize in light tackle, shallow water flats fishing for bonefish, permit and tarpon. Our guides are English speaking and experienced in guiding both fly and spin fishermen. One or two anglers per boat/guide.
node.body: El Pescador, means “The fisherman” and we specialize in light tackle, shallow water flats fishing for bonefish, permit and tarpon. Our guides are English speaking and experienced in guiding both fly and spin fishermen. One or two anglers per boat/guide.
node.price: Full Day - US $650 tax for up to 2 people,
node.metadescription: El Pescador specializes in light tackle, shallow water flats fishing for bonefish, permit, and tarpon. English-speaking guides for fly and spin fishermen.

node.name: Great Blue Hole & Barrier Reef (Flight Only)
node.summary: Enjoy miles of unspoiled beauty as you fly across the Belize Barrier Reef System to view secluded islands, mangrove-covered cayes, diverse marine life, and the famed Great Blue Hole, a UNESCO World Heritage site.
node.body:
Enjoy miles of unspoiled beauty as you fly across the Belize Barrier Reef System to view secluded islands, mangrove-covered cayes, diverse marine life, and the famed Great Blue Hole, a UNESCO World Heritage site.

Aircraft - Bell 206 Jet Ranger (max load 700 lbs)

Seating for: Four (4)

Departure from San Pedro

‍

‍
node.metadescription: Fly over the Belize Barrier Reef System and marvel at secluded islands, mangroves, marine life, and the Great Blue Hole, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Book your

node.name: Great Blue Hole & Barrier Reef Flight and Snorkel Dive Add-on
node.summary: Enjoy miles of unspoiled beauty as you fly across the Belize Barrier Reef System to view secluded islands, mangrove-covered cayes, diverse marine life, and the famed Great Blue Hole, a UNESCO World Heritage site.
node.body:
Disembark at a private Caye, where a waiting boat will whisk you away to either diving or snorkeling adventures at three amazing sites: Great Blue Hole, Half Moon Caye, and The Aquarium.

Aircraft - Bell 206 Jet Ranger (max load 700 lbs) .

Seating for: Four (4)

Departure from San Pedro

Lunch Included

Note: Bell 407 available for additional fee (max load 1100 lbs. with seating for six).

‍
node.metadescription: Soar over the Belize Barrier Reef System and view secluded islands, mangroves, marine life, and the Great Blue Hole, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Experience th

node.name: Kayak San Pedro Lagoon
node.summary: A two or four hours guided interpretive kayaking tour of the San Pedro lagoon. Experience the beauty of mangrove lagoons, birds, fish, flora and fauna.
node.body: A two or four hours guided interpretive kayaking tour of the San Pedro lagoon. Experience the beauty of mangrove lagoons, birds, fish, flora and fauna.
node.duration: AM departs EP 9am – PM departs EP 2pm
node.price: US $50 per person x per hour. Two hour minimum.

node.name: Lamanai and New River Excursion (Air/Land)
node.summary: With this shorter excursion you will travel by air to the ancient Maya City of Lamanai.
node.body:
Visit the ancient Maya City of Lamanai (submerged crocodile). Tour temples and carved stone monuments nestled in the tropical jungle. The excavations done at Lamanai show a variety of structures including temples, residences and palace buildings. Full day tour includes a light breakfast, lunch, entrance fees, water, sodas, and rum punch.

You will be flown from San Pedro to inland Belize close to Lamanai where you will take quick journey by tour bus to the site.
node.metadescription: Discover the ancient Maya City of Lamanai with a full-day tour. Fly from San Pedro, tour temples and monuments, and enjoy breakfast, lunch, and drinks. Book now

node.name: Lamanai New River Excursion (Boat/Land)
node.summary: An exceptionally clear and unspoiled river leads you to the New River lagoon and the ancient Maya City of Lamanai.
node.body:
An exceptionally clear and unspoiled river leads you to the New River lagoon and the ancient Maya City of Lamanai (submerged crocodile). Tour temples and carved stone monuments nestled in the tropical jungle. The excavations done at Lamanai show a variety of structures including temples, residences and palace buildings. Birdwatchers—this one is for you! Full day tour includes a light breakfast, lunch, entrance fees, water, sodas, and rum punch.

You will travel by boat up the New River and then disembark for your tour of Lamanai.
node.metadescription: Explore the ancient Maya City of Lamanai on a full-day tour. Journey by boat up the New River, see temples and monuments, and enjoy birdwatching. Book Now!

node.name: Manatee Watch Snorkeling 1/2 Day
node.summary: An up close and personal view of the West Indies Manatees in their natural habitat. Snorkel at the Caye Caulker Channel & Corals Gardens .
node.body: An up close and personal view of the West Indies Manatees in their natural habitat. Snorkel at the Caye Caulker Channel &  Corals Gardens . Visit the famous "split" for lunch and cocktails guest will need to bring money or credit cards to purchase lunch.
node.metadescription: Enjoy a half-day Manatee Watch Snorkeling tour. See West Indies Manatees, snorkel at Caye Caulker Channel & Coral Gardens, and visit the "split" for lunch.

node.name: Mexico Rocks Sailing
node.summary: Enjoy a full day of sailing while stopping at our preferred snorkel stops - Habaneros, Mexico Rocks, and Mata Grande shipwreck. Mid-day enjoy a feast of local BBQ.
node.body:
Escape to the northern side of Ambergris Caye. Enjoy a full day of sailing while stopping at our preferred snorkel stops - Habaneros, Mexico Rocks, and Mata Grande shipwreck. Mid-day enjoy a feast of local BBQ. Enjoy the tranquility and peacefulness of the less inhabited side of our island.

‍
node.metadescription: Set sail on a full-day adventure with El Pescador. Snorkel at Habaneros, Mexico Rocks, and Mata Grande shipwreck. Enjoy a delicious local BBQ. Book now!]

node.name: Parasailing
node.summary: This excursion gives you a bird’s-eye view of our beautiful island. Ride with the most experienced crew in Belize, in comfort and trust.
node.body:
This excursion gives you a bird’s-eye view of our beautiful island. Ride with the most experienced crew in Belize, in comfort and trust.

‍
node.duration: Time varies depending on individual or group.
node.price: US $125 for Single, US $200 for tandem, US $260 for triple
node.metadescription: Experience parasailing in Belize for a bird's-eye view of our beautiful island. Fly with the most experienced crew in comfort and trust. Book now!

node.name: Reef Fishing & Beach Picnic
node.summary: Fish the reef and enjoy your catch with a BBQ lunch on a secluded beach. Enjoy wading, shelling or just relaxing in the sun while your picnic is prepared. Spend the afternoon snorkeling or try more fishing!
node.body:
Fish the reef for your “catch of the day.” Your guide will BBQ your freshly caught fish on a secluded beach. You may enjoy wading, shelling or just relaxing in the sun while your picnic is prepared. Spend the afternoon snorkeling or try more fishing! Includes boat, fishing gear and guide for eight consecutive hours, lunch and drinks. Up to four anglers per boat/guide.

FULL DAY: US $650 for up to 4 people

HALF DAY: US $425 for up to 4 people
node.metadescription: Enjoy reef fishing and a BBQ lunch on a secluded beach with El Pescador. Relax, snorkel, or fish more after your picnic. Book your Belize adventure now!

node.name: Scuba Diving Trips
node.summary: Choose local diving or full day trips with one, two, or three tanks. Day and night dives available.
node.body:
Local Diving:

One, Two and Three tank local dives plus Night dives

Day trips

  • The Blue Hole (3 Tanks)
  • Turneffe Elbow (3 Tanks)

Ambergris Caye offers some of the most beautiful diving in the world. Enjoy the numerous fish and beautiful coral at the dozens of dive sites along our barrier reef, or venture out to some of the breathtaking atolls for an all day trip.

*Please note all scuba divers MUST be certified and MUST have been diving within the past 3 years to qualify for local diving rates.  If you do not meet these requirements, we also offer PADI courses.

Rates

Includes weights, belt, tank(s), and drinks. Personal gear such as BCD, regulator, mask, snorkel & fins, lights for night dives and/or wetsuit are not included but are available for rent.

Park fees, if applicable, are not included. You must be certified to dive.

Local diving rates (min 2 pax):

  • Local 1 tank US $60 per person
  • Local 2 tank US $90 per person
  • Local 3 tank US $145 per person

Turneffe Elbow

  • 3-Tank with Beach BBQ US $235 per person (min12 pax)

Blue Hole

  • 3 tank US $285 per person (includes US $40 park fee) (min12 pax)

‍
node.metadescription: Explore Ambergris Caye's stunning dive sites with local dives and day trips to The Blue Hole and Turneffe Elbow. Certified divers only. Book your dive adventure

node.name: Scuba Diving Courses
node.summary: Resort Course, Refresher Course, Referral Course, Open Water Course, Advanced Open Water, Rescue, Medic First Aid and Dive Master.
node.body:
PADI dive instructors offer a variety of courses for the novice to the experienced diver. 

Courses Available

Resort / Refresher Course US $150
Resort Discover Scuba Diving Course US $180
E-learning Referral US $400
Advanced Open Water US $450
Open Water Certification US $450
Rescue Course US $300
node.duration: The length of the dive courses varies from a half day to one week.
node.metadescription: Learn to dive with PADI instructors at El Pescador. Courses for all levels: beginner to advanced. Book now and start your underwater adventure!

node.name: Snorkeling
node.summary: Half-day trips include Hol Chan Marine Reserve and Shark Ray Alley, Mexico Rocks, and Coral Gardens.
node.body:
Enjoy the underwater wonders of the Belize Barrier Reef, host to a variety of species including sharks, rays, eels, grouper, parrot fish, trigger fish, seahorses, turtles, shrimp, sea fans, coral and many other wondrous aquatic lives. Length and rate of trips vary by snorkeling destinations.

1/2 day trips include Hol Chan Marine Reserve & Shark Ray Alley, Mexico Rocks, and Coral Gardens.

Snorkeling Hol Chan & Shark Ray Alley marine reserve (half day)

  • US $70 per person

Coral Garden snorkeling (half day)

  • US $160 per person

Mexico Rocks 2 snorkeling stops (half day)

  • US $70 per person

‍
node.duration: Time and cost varies depending on destination
node.metadescription: Discover the Belize Barrier Reef's diverse marine life with snorkeling trips to Hol Chan, Shark Ray Alley, Mexico Rocks, and Coral Gardens. Book your adventure

node.name: Snorkeling Trip to Bacalar Chico
node.summary: Make three snorkeling stops on the way up the coast of Ambergris Caye to the border with Mexico and the beautiful, remote Bacalar Chico Marine Reserve, UNESCO World Heritage site.
node.body: Make three snorkeling stops on the way up the coast of Ambergris Caye to the border with Mexico and the beautiful, remote Bacalar Chico marine reserve, UNESCO World Heritage site. This spot offers excellent opportunities to collect seashells or, for those who brought along a fishing rod, wade un-guided for bonefish. Enjoy a delicious beach picnic of fresh seasonal seafood cooked over coconut husks.
node.price: For 1 to 8 guests - US $900, any additional guests US $100 each
node.metadescription: Snorkel at three stunning spots along Ambergris Caye, ending at the Bacalar Chico Marine Reserve, a UNESCO World Heritage site. Book your adventure with El Pesc

node.name: Snorkeling Trip to Caye Caulker - (Charter)
node.summary: Snorkeling trip to Caye Caulker with stops at Hol Chan and Shark Ray Alley. Lunch at Caye Caulker , then feed the Tarpon and Rays
node.body:
Snorkeling at Hol Chan & Shark Ray Alley, then visit our neighboring island Caye Caulker for lunch, guest will need to  bring money or credit cards to purchase lunch

Tarpon feeding, sightseeing seahorse, and feeding the rays.

‍
node.metadescription: Snorkel at Hol Chan & Shark Ray Alley, then lunch at Caye Caulker. Enjoy tarpon feeding, seahorse sightseeing, and ray feeding. Bring money for lunch. Book now!

node.name: Spa Services
node.summary: Enjoy a fabulous deep tissue massage, facial, manicure, or pedicure from one of our specialists.
node.body:
Enjoy a fabulous deep tissue massage, facial, manicure, or pedicure from one of our specialists. Spa services may be conducted in the massage Room (in the main lodge on the second floor above the office), in your room or villa, on the dock or even on the beach!

  • Massage - US $80 per hour
  • Manicure - US $25
  • Pedicure - US $40
  • Facial - US $50

‍
node.duration: Available by appointment. Please schedule with the front desk.
node.metadescription: Indulge in a deep tissue massage, facial, manicure, or pedicure at El Pescador. Enjoy spa services in your room, villa, on the dock, or beach. Book your relaxat
